name: CMDeviceMotion
desc: Encapsulated measurements of the attitude, rotation rate, and acceleration of a device.

items.name: var rotationRate: CMRotationRate
items.desc: The rotation rate of the device.

items.name: var gravity: CMAcceleration
items.desc: The gravity acceleration vector expressed in the device's reference frame.

items.name: var userAcceleration: CMAcceleration
items.desc: The acceleration that the user is giving to the device.

items.name: var magneticField: CMCalibratedMagneticField
items.desc: Returns the magnetic field vector with respect to the device.

items.name: struct CMCalibratedMagneticField
items.desc: Calibrated magnetic field data and an estimate of the accuracy of the calibration.

items.name: enum CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy
items.desc: Indicates the calibration accuracy of a magnetic field estimate

items.name: var heading: Double
items.desc: The heading angle (measured in degrees) relative to the current reference frame.

items.name: var sensorLocation: CMDeviceMotion.SensorLocation
items.desc: The location of the sensors that compute the device-motion data.
